item.description:
Beadin' Path has beautiful beads to inspire a wonderful creation. I have chosen for us to make the floating necklace from the menu. You do not have to have experience to do this.

 

The price for this is $15 plus tax and a $5 sitting fee. (Total: $20 + $1 meetup fee)

 

The Girls Night Out that we will be having is after hours but you are encouraged to come a little early so that you can see if there is something extra that you want to add to your necklace.

 

Please feel free to bring food and drinks (wine and beer are allowed) that you would like to share. I will bring nachos, plates and cups.

Here is the link for the Beadin' Path. http://www.beadinpath.com/index.php/Store-Events/girls-night-out-make-beaded-jewelry-with-friends.html
item.how_to_find_us: You can look for the table that is set up or ask for the beading class.
item.name: Create Beautiful Jewelry at Beadin' Path in Freeport
